channel.title: Help! Burning a movie on dvd
channel.description:
Hi! So, I have a bunch of movies on my computer, all of them being 700mb+ so they won't fit on regular CD-R's. I went and bought a couple DVD+RW's, but I have no idea how to burn the files onto the DVD so I'm able to play them on my dvd-player.
Note: the movies are in .avi format (DivX, I believe)
How??? :confused:
edit: also, it isn't prolly necessary to convert the .avi files because I have a small dvd-player that has divx enabled, the one that doesnt have it is the one that's linked to da tv so yeah
